import unittest



[docs]class TestMultiplikation(unittest.TestCase):


[docs]    def setUp(self):
        self.b = Bruch(3, 2)
        self.b2 = Bruch(self.b)
        self.b3 = Bruch(4, 2)
        pass



[docs]    def tearDown(self):
        del self.b, self.b2, self.b3
        pass



[docs]    def testmal(self):
        self.b = self.b * Bruch(4)
        assert(float(self.b) == 6)



[docs]    def testmal2(self):
        self.b = self.b * self.b2
        assert(float(self.b) == 2.25)



[docs]    def testmal3(self):
        self.b2 = self.b * 2
        assert(float(self.b2) == 3)



[docs]    def testiMulError(self):
        self.assertRaises(TypeError, self.b.__imul__, "other")



[docs]    def testiMul(self):
        self.b *= 2
        assert(self.b == 3)



[docs]    def testiMul2(self):
        self.b *= Bruch(2)
        assert(self.b == 3)



[docs]    def testrmal(self):
        self.b2 = 2 * Bruch(3, 2)
        assert(float(self.b2) == 3)



[docs]    def testmulError(self):
        self.assertRaises(TypeError, self.b2.__mul__, 2.0)


if __name__ == "__main__":
    unittest.main()
